channel.title: WebGIS on GIS 4 Labrador
channel.description: Recent content in WebGIS on GIS 4 Labrador

item.title: WebGIS
item.description: WebGIS makes it easy to create a beautiful map for free using QGIS. Customize anything on your map with widgets, themes, and language packs. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cQcuJY7KK0BLfu7DBWSUdgPd-rXOmouX18UL1Z7sQqY/edit#gid=239928523/gviz/tq?tq=select%A Introduction Online mapping tools uMap uMap Luca MAPWARPER Tutorial per creare mappe online su UMAP aggiornabili con file CSV da GOOGLEDRIVE Query Language Kepler Teaching Digital Mapping with kepler.gl kepler.gl - Tutorial Mapstarter is a tool for turning a geographic data file into a map for the web
